q: '' Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded U.S. Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said.`` All sorts of nastiness. As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said,`` I care deeply about animals'' and`` am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Tight end Brent Celek agreed, when he spoke via phone yesterday with a group of reporters from his minivacation getaway in Michigan: Sometimes he's taking some big-time hits, where maybe other guys would get flagged and he's not. Hopefully, they change it. He's a quarterback, too. He's the same as everybody else. Just because he's maybe a little bit more athletic and faster and can run, he shouldn't be penalized. Expect to see more of this sort of lobbying. We're well into the stretch drive and Michael Vick , the most amazing NFL story of 2010, obviously is the key to the Eagles' postseason hopes
